GetKerning
virtual float GetKerning(
wchar_t charUnicode,
wchar_t secondCharUnicode,
float charSize
) = 0

Kerning represents the drawing position offset when drawn after certain characters. (i.e. AV has a negative kerning for the characte V)

LoadFromPath
virtual bool LoadFromPath(
std::string path
) = 0

Loads a font file. Supported font format is dependent on the backend.

path can be either absolute or relative. Please see BackendFontSFML::LoadFromPath for supported font format.
